RoundedButton - Class in utilities
Utility class for creating customized JButton with rounded corners and gradient backgrounds.
RoundedButton() - Constructor for class utilities.RoundedButton
 
RoundedCornerBorder - Class in utilities
A custom border class that creates a border with rounded corners.
RoundedCornerBorder(int, Color) - Constructor for class utilities.RoundedCornerBorder
Constructs a RoundedCornerBorder with the specified radius and color.
RoundedCornerBorder(Color) - Constructor for class utilities.RoundedCornerBorder
Constructs a RoundedCornerBorder with a default radius of 25 and the specified color.
RoundedPanel - Class in utilities
A custom JPanel subclass that features rounded corners.
RoundedPanel(int) - Constructor for class utilities.RoundedPanel
Constructs a RoundedPanel with a uniform radius for all corners, creating a circular curvature at each corner.
RoundedPanel(int, int) - Constructor for class utilities.RoundedPanel
Constructs a RoundedPanel with specified radii for the corners.
RoundedPasswordField - Class in utilities
A customized version of JPasswordField that supports placeholder text and rounded corners.
RoundedPasswordField(String) - Constructor for class utilities.RoundedPasswordField
Constructs a RoundedPasswordField with placeholder text.
RoundedTextField - Class in utilities
A custom JTextField that includes support for placeholder text and rounded corners.
RoundedTextField(String) - Constructor for class utilities.RoundedTextField
Constructs a RoundedTextField with specified placeholder text.
Row - Class in table
Represents a row in a table, which can hold information about a person across multiple cells.
Row() - Constructor for class table.Row
Constructs an empty row with a predefined number of cells.
Row(Person) - Constructor for class table.Row
Constructs a row and initializes each cell with data from the given person.
run() - Method in class logic.Phonebook
Runs the main loop of the phonebook application, handling user input for various actions such as logging in, signing in, managing contacts, and deleting the account.
